```{r data, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Read in the clean csv file
cpa_data <- read_csv("CPA_2021/cpa_analyses.csv")

cpa_data %>%
  filter(sex %in% c("Female", "Male")) %>%
  group_by(chronic_dummy, comorbid_dep_anx) %>%
  count() %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE, "hover")
```
